## ColorThemeOptions interface

Color theme configuration for automatic arc coloring.

Supports three theme types: - Qualitative: For categorical data (assigns colors by key/depth) - Sequential: For ordered data (light to dark progression) - Diverging: For data with a meaningful midpoint

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ColorThemeOptions 
```

## Properties

Property


</th><th>

Modifiers


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

<a href="./sandjs.colorthemeoptions.assignby.html">assignBy?</a>


</td><td>


</td><td>

'depth' \| 'key' \| 'index' \| 'value'


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ How to assign colors from the palette. - 'depth': Assign colors based on arc depth (default for sequential/diverging) - 'key': Assign colors based on arc key (default for qualitative) - 'index': Assign colors based on arc index in layer - 'value': Assign colors based on arc value (normalized)


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

<a href="./sandjs.colorthemeoptions.derivekey.html">deriveKey?</a>


</td><td>


</td><td>

(arc: <a href="./sandjs.layoutarc.html">LayoutArc</a><!-- -->) =&gt; string \| number


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Custom function to derive a color key from an arc. Overrides assignBy when provided.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

<a href="./sandjs.colorthemeoptions.palette.html">palette</a>


</td><td>


</td><td>

<a href="./sandjs.qualitativepalettename.html">QualitativePaletteName</a> \| <a href="./sandjs.sequentialpalettename.html">SequentialPaletteName</a> \| <a href="./sandjs.divergingpalettename.html">DivergingPaletteName</a> \| <a href="./sandjs.colorpalette.html">ColorPalette</a>


</td><td>

Palette name or custom color array. If a string, must match a built-in palette name for the chosen type. If an array, provides custom colors.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

<a href="./sandjs.colorthemeoptions.type.html">type</a>


</td><td>


</td><td>

'qualitative' \| 'sequential' \| 'diverging'


</td><td>

Theme type to use for color assignment


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
